body: <!-- This tells everyone that this is an AMP file. `<html amp>` works too -->
<!-- The charset definition must be the first child of the `<head>` tag -->
<!-- The AMP runtime must be loaded as the second child of the `<head>` tag.-->
<!--AMP HTML files require a canonical link pointing to the regular HTML. If no HTML version exists, it should point to itself -->

<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
<!-- This tells everyone that this is an amp4ads file. `<html amp4ads>` works too -->

<!--Include optional meta tags in HTML head as identifiers. Those meta tags must be placed before the amp4ads-v0.js script. The value of vendor and id are strings containing only [0-9a-zA-Z_-]. The value of type is either creative-id or impression-id-->
<!-- This tells everyone that this is an amp4email file. `<html ⚡4email>` works too -->
"description": "Very sweet gentleman that is quite shy in a shelter environment. He may hide under his blanket upon initial approach, but he is an affectionate lovebug."
"description": "Friendly and enjoys pets and head rubs. Is known to sit on keyboards and refuses to touch anything with catnip on it."
"description": "Both bold and extremely sweet. Wastes no time in investigating new smells, objects, and places, but enjoys lazing in the sun!"
"description": "This playful and spirited cat would like to be outside his kennel and will be so happy when he gets to his forever home with more room to move."
<amp-carousel id="carousel-with-preview" width="800" height="400" layout="responsive" type="slides" on="slideChange:AMP.setState({currentCat: event.index})">
Very sweet gentleman that is quite shy in a shelter environment. He may hide under his blanket upon initial approach, but he is an affectionate lovebug.

amp-access-laterpay.description: Allows publishers to easily integrate with the LaterPay micropayments platform. Requires amp-access script, amp-analytics script, amp-laterpay script in the HEAD section

amp-access-poool.description: The amp-access-poool component, based on amp-access, loads and shows a paywall using your bundleID from Poool's Dashboard configuration. Requires amp-access script, amp-poool script in the HEAD section

amp-access.description: AMP Access or “AMP paywall and subscription support” gives Publishers control over which content can be accessed by a reader. Requires amp-access script in the HEAD section

amp-accordion.description: Provides a way for viewers to glance at the content outline and jump to any section. Add amp-accordion script in the HEAD section

amp-analytics.description: Capture analytics data from an AMP document. Requires amp-analytics script in the HEAD section

amp-action-macro.description: Creates reusable actions. Requires amp-action script in the HEAD section

amp-ad-exit.description: The amp-ad-exit element is configured with a JSON child script element and exposes an 'exit' action to other elements in the AMPHTML ad. Requires amp-ad-exit script in the HEAD section

amp-ad.description: A container to display an ad. Requires amp-ad script in the HEAD section

amp-embed.description: The amp-embed is an alias to the amp-ad tag.  Use amp-embed when semantically more accurate. AMP documents only support ads/embeds served via HTTPS. Requires amp-ad script in the HEAD section

amp-addthis.description: Displays AddThis customizable social share buttons. Requires amp-addthis script in the HEAD section
body: <amp-addthis data-widget-type="${1:floating|inline}" width="$2" height="$3" layout="${4:responsive}" data-pub-id="$5" data-widget-id="$6">

amp-anim.description: A runtime-managed animated image, typically a GIF. Requires amp-anim script in the HEAD section
body: <amp-anim width="$1" height="$2" src="$3" alt="$5" attribution="$6" layout="$7">

amp-app-banner.description: A wrapper and minimal UI for a cross-platform, fixed-position banner showing a call-to-action to install an app
body: Experience a richer experience on our mobile app!

amp-audio.description: A replacement for the HTML5 audio tag. The amp-audio component is only to be used for direct HTML5 audio file embeds
body: <amp-audio width="$1" height="$2" src="$3" artwork="$4" title="$5" artist="$6" album="$7">

amp-auto-ads.description: Dynamically injects ads into an AMP page by using a remotely-served configuration file

amp-autocomplete.description: For suggesting completed items based on user input to help users carry out their task more quickly

amp-base-carousel.description: [Experimental] You must turn on the amp-base-carousel experiment to use this component. A generic carousel for displaying multiple similar pieces of content along a horizontal or vertical axis

body: <amp-beopinion width="$1" height="$2" layout="${3:responsive}" data-account="$4" data-content="$5" data-name="$6">

amp-bodymovin-animation.description: Displays an AirBnB Bodymovin animation player, which renders an animation from JSON generated by Adobe After Effects

amp-brid-player.description: An amp-brid-player displays the Brid Player used in Brid.tv Video Platform
body: <amp-brid-player data-partner="$1" data-player="$2" data-video="$3" layout="${4:responsive}" width="$5" height="$6">

amp-brightcove.description: The amp-brightcove component allows embedding a Brightcove Video Cloud or Perform player
body: <amp-brightcove data-account="$1" data-player="${2:default}" data-embed="${3:default}" data-video-id="$4" layout="${5:responsive}" width="$6" height="$7">

amp-byside-content.description: The amp-byside-content component is available for BySide customers and displays dynamic content that can be retrieved from the BySide customization mechanisms
body: <amp-byside-content data-webcare-id="$1" data-label="${2:amp-responsive}" data-lang="${3:en}" width="$4" height="$5" layout="${6:responsive}">

amp-call-tracking.description: Dynamically replaces a phone number in a hyperlink to enable call tracking. Executes a CORS request to substitute the number

amp-carousel.description: A generic carousel for displaying multiple similar pieces of content along a horizontal axis; meant to be flexible and performant

amp-consent.description: Provides the ability to collect and store a user's consent through a UI control. Also provides the ability to block other AMP components based on the user's consent

body: <amp-dailymotion data-videoid="$1" layout="${2:responsive}" data-ui-logo="${3:false}" data-info="${4:false}" width="$5" height="$6">

amp-date-countdown.description: Display a sequence of backward counting to indicate the time remaining before an event is scheduled to occur
body: {{d}} days, {{h}} hours, {{m}} minutes and {{s}} seconds until

amp-date-picker.description: Renders a calendar on a page that a user can select dates from

amp-delight-player.description: The amp-delight-player element displays a cloud-hosted Delight Player

amp-embedly-card.description: Provides responsive and shareable embeds to drive the reach of your websites, blog posts, and articles from any URL using Embedly cards
body: <amp-embedly-card data-url="$1" layout="${2:responsive}" width="$3" height="$4" data-card-theme="$5" data-card-controls="$6">

amp-experiment.description: Conduct user experience experiments (such as A/B testing and multivariate testing) on an AMP document and collect corresponding data with amp-pixel or amp-analytics

amp-facebook-like.description: To embed the Facebook like button plugin

amp-facebook-page.description: To embed the Facebook page plugin

amp-facebook.description: Displays a Facebook post, video or comment

amp-fit-text.description: Expands or shrinks its font size to fit the content within the space given to it

amp-font.description: Trigger and monitor the loading of custom fonts on AMP pages

amp-form.description: Allows to create forms (<form>) to submit input fields in an AMP document

amp-fx-collection.description: Provides a collection of preset visual effects, such as parallax

amp-fx-flying-carpet.description: A flying carpet wraps its children in a unique full-screen scrolling container

amp-geo.description: Provides an approximate country-level geolocation interface

amp-google-document-embed.description: Displays document files like Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, and PDFs.

amp-google-vrview-image.description: [Experimental] You must turn on the amp-google-vrview-image experiment to use this component. Display VR image
body: <amp-google-vrview-image src="$1" stereo width="$2" yao = "$3" height="$4" layout="${5:responsive}">

amp-hulu.description: Displays a simple embedded Hulu video

amp-ima-video.description: Embeds a video player for instream video ads that are integrated with the IMA SDK

amp-image-lightbox.description: Provides a lightbox effect for a specified image

amp-image-slider.description: A slider to compare two images

amp-img.description: AMP runtime-managed replacement for the HTML img tag

amp-inputmask.description: Provides input masking capabilities to inputs in AMP forms

amp-install-serviceworker.description: Installs a ServiceWorker for the current page

amp-kaltura-player.description: Displays the Kaltura Player as used in Kaltura's Video Platform

amp-lightbox-gallery.description: Provides a 'lightbox' experience. Upon user interaction, a UI component expands to fill the viewport until it is closed by the user

amp-lightbox.description: Displays elements in a full-viewport “lightbox” modal

amp-list.description: Fetches content dynamically from a CORS JSON endpoint and renders it using a supplied template

amp-live-list.description: A wrapper and minimal UI for content that updates live in the client instance as new content is available in the source document

amp-mega-menu.description: [Experimental] activated by the amp-mega-menu experiment. Horizontal navigation bar with menu items that open/close content containers on click

amp-megaphone.description: Displays a Megaphone.fm podcast episode or playlist

amp-minute-media-player.description: An amp-minute-media-player component displays Minute Media player

amp-nested-menu.description: [Experimental] activated by the amp-nested-menu experiment. Drilldown menu component with items that open nested submenus on tap

amp-next-page.description: Dynamically loads more documents recommended for the user

amp-nexxtv-player.description: Displays a media stream from the nexxOMNIA platform

amp-orientation-observer.description: Monitors the orientation of an element within the viewport as a user scrolls, and dispatches events that can be used with other AMP components

amp-pan-zoom.description: Provides zooming and panning for arbitrary content

amp-pinterest.description: Displays a Pinterest widget or Save button

amp-pixel.description: A tracking pixel to count page views

amp-playbuzz.description: Displays any Playbuzz content (e.g., list, poll, etc.)

amp-position-observer.description: Monitors the orientation of an element within the viewport as a user scrolls, and dispatches events that can be used with other AMP components

amp-powr-player.description: An amp-powr-player component displays the Powr Player as configured in the Powr platform

amp-reach-player.description: Displays a Beachfront Reach video player

amp-recaptcha-input.description: Appends a reCAPTCHA v3 token to AMP form submissions

amp-reddit.description: Displays a Reddit comment or post embed

amp-riddle-quiz.description: Displays Riddle content (e.g., quiz, list, poll, etc.)

amp-script.description: Allows running custom JavaScript to render UI

amp-selector.description: Represents a control that presents a menu of options and lets the user choose from it

amp-sidebar.description: Provides a way to display meta content intended for temporary access such as navigation, links, buttons, menus

amp-skimlinks.description: Run skimlinks inside your AMP page

amp-smartlinks.description: Run Narrativ's Linkmate process inside your AMP page

amp-springboard-player.description: Displays a Springboard Platform video player

amp-sticky-ad.description: Provides a way to display and stick ad content at the bottom of the page

amp-story-auto-ads.description: Dynamically inserts ads into a Story

amp-subscriptions-google.description: Implements subscription-style access protocol for Subscribe with Google

amp-story-page.description: amp-story-page custom component. Requires within amp-story component and amp-story script in the HEAD section

amp-timeago.description: Provides fuzzy timestamps by formatting dates as 'time ago' (for example, 3 hours ago)

amp-truncate-text.description: Truncates text with an ellipsis, optionally showing an overflow element

amp-twitter.description: Provides fuzzy timestamps by formatting dates as 'time ago' (for example, 3 hours ago)

amp-user-notification.description: Displays a dismissable notification to the user

amp-video-docking.description: Functionality for videos that minimize ('dock') to a corner or a custom position on scroll

amp-video-iframe.description: Include an amp-video-iframe on your AMP document

body: ${9:This browser does not support the video element.}

amp-vk.description: Embeds a VK post or poll widget

amp-web-push.description: Allows users to subscribe to web push notifications
